title: Recruitment
description: Cornell Data Science is recruiting for Fall 2022! Please attend our Information Sessions to learn more and get any specific questions answered. The timeline is shown below. Applications are due Sept. 1 for upperclassmen, and Sept. 29 for first-year students.

info.title: Info Sessions
info.body: The Information Sessions will be held on September 14, 2022 (Wednesday) from 5:30pm to 6:30pm (ET) in Upson 142 and September 15, 2022 (Thursday) from 5:30pm to 6:30pm (ET) in Upson 216. The slides are available here

info.title: Application
info.body:
All five sub-teams - Insights, Intelligent Systems, Data Engineering, Algorithmic Trading, and Education - are recruiting this semester. You may apply to up to two of these (through the same application form). After the application review, selected candidates will be contacted to schedule interviews.

We are not recruiting at this time.

info.title: Interviews
info.body: We will reach out to select applicants to conduct interviews over the following weeks. These will be both technical and behavioral. More information, and materials will be sent to those in question.
